entry.title: WIND WARNING , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 80 gusting to 100 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 80 km/h gusting to 100 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
